title: GetGroupMemberCount (Method)
text:
METHOD GetGroupMemberCount : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets the count of group-members and group-members-names entries in the Group_Members-BACnet-Property and Group_Member_Names-BACnetProperty of this BACnet-Global-Group-Object.
Both the count of group-members and group-members-names have to be the same, so can be aquired at once.
